definition[0]: on the highest part or surface of something
example[0]: The cake was a bit burnt on top.
example[1]: a high roof with a chimney on top
definition[1]: on the highest part of your head
example[2]: Can you cut it quite short on top, please.
definition[2]: winning in a game or competition
example[3]: After the first set, the Australian was comfortably on top.
